description: Can blast through anything…and anyone.
This slim little firearm can be hidden anywhere.
Small yet effiecient. Has a nasty kickback though.
What it lacks in size it makes up in…actually nevermind, this gun is cheap for a reason.
Sure to "light" up any party, heh heh heh.
The ammo magazine actually works like a second barrel. Neat!
A gun perfect for atomizing your foes, leaving no evidence behind.
Your dream of shooting a laser from your hand can now come true!
A pecuiliar gun. Holding the trigger actually charges up a powerful blast. Its effectiveness is questionable in a battle though.
Used by Space Sheriffs all over the galaxy, this gun can be utilized by desperados as wells.
Sneaky gun, this one. It looks like a space wrench at first, but little do your enemies know it can pack some heat.
A very basic gun really. Doesn't stand out that much.
This turret can lock-on to any potential threats from far away.
Please note this gun is NOT intended for stabbing.
A highly destructive magma gun. How it shoots magma without melting is beyond us.
A common weapon among the Space Army, favored for its effectiveness.
Ever wanted laser chainsaws for hands? If so, then you are fairly disturbed, but here it is.
A solid choice for decent gun.
You can arm yourself with this armed gun that adorns your arm!
Evaporate your enemies with this eco-friendly gun.
This turret can pierce even the strongest of metals.
Used by the elite Space Millitary.
With the kickback on this baby, be careful not to break your arm.
A gun that can change shape? Is that even viable?
This awesome gun is gonna turn up the heat for sure!
It costs 400,000 Space Dollars to fire this gun for 12 seconds.
Does not include Hello Kitty stickers to put on it.
Used by officers to detain Space Criminals.
Used more to look cool and scary rather than be effective at shooting.
Despite its appearance, it actually uses Plasma Pods!
Bringing in the pain in style.
Bulky and chunky for a handgun, but can pierce the hardest of body armor.
Your own portable flamethrower! Set the world on fire!
Small, powerful, accurate, deadly, and versatile. You can become a one man army with this monster.
When working on a space ships plumbing, sometimes you need protection from creatures lurking in the pipes.
A weird looking gun, even by our standards.
Commonly used for welding, it can also serve more dastardly purposes.
